name: My Poor Retinas
description:
My Poor Retinas is a reimagining of the class Berzerk in the style of the artis Bridget Riley. Your retinas may be seared. Your visual cortex forever damaged. But still the robotic distortions remain. They're waiting for you.

Controls

  • W or Up Arrow - Up
  • A or Left Arrow - Left
  • S or Down Arrow - Down
  • D or Right Arrow - Right
  • Control, Space or Left Mouse Button - Fire
